IActionclass

action.t[3010]

Superclass

Subclass
Tree

Summary

Method
Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

Intransitive Action class - this is an action that takes no objects. In general, each subclass should implement its action handling in its execAction() method. `class `**`IAction`**` :   `[`Action`](../object/Action.html)
